Author: GitHub
Description:
This week on The Download, we are diving into a huge announcement from OpenAI: the introduction of AgentKit, a new toolkit for building AI agents. We also look to the future with the 'Stargate' project, the massive hardware that will power next-generation AI. Plus, we cover spec-kit, Newton joining the Linux Foundation, and a look at open source projects coming to GitHub Universe.

#TheDownload #DevNews #GitHub

— CHAPTERS —

00:00 Welcome to The Download 00:12 Open source projects coming to GitHub Universe 01:05 Protegrity's new toolkit for GenAI developers 01:31 Project Newton joins the Linux Foundation 02:13 spec-kit: A new toolkit for building software 02:58 OpenAI releases its new Agent Kit 03:36 The 'Stargate' project: Hardware for future AI 03:55 This week's news recap

Title: The Download: OpenAI's AgentKit, Project Newton, the open source projects coming to Universe & more
